name: @gold.au/site
description: The GOLD Design System, previously known as the Australian Government Design System docs website.

scripts.prebuild: npm run prebuild:pancake && node src/helper/helper.js components
scripts.build:sass: mkdirp src/assets/css/ && node-sass src/sass --output-style compressed --output src/assets/css
scripts.build:sass:dev: mkdirp src/assets/css/ && node-sass src/sass --output-style compact --source-map true --output src/assets/css/
scripts.build:css: npm run build:sass && npm run build:autoprefix
scripts.build:uglify: uglifyjs src/assets/js/header.js --compress --output src/assets/js/header.js && uglifyjs src/assets/js/footer.js --compress --output src/assets/js/footer.js
scripts.build:js: mkdirp src/assets/js/ && npm run build:js-a11y && npm run build:js-header && npm run build:js-footer && npm run build:uglify
scripts.build:assets: npm run build:css && npm run build:js
scripts.build: npm run build:assets && npm run build:site
scripts.watch:sass: onchange 'src/sass/**/*.scss' -- npm run build:sass:dev && npm run build:autoprefix
scripts.watch: npm run build && npm run watch:sass | npm run watch:js | npm run watch:site
